article.headline: Gardner-Webb 58, Charleston Southern 50
article.story: BOILING SPRINGS, N.C. -- Stefon Johnson scored 10 points and grabbed 10 rebounds as Gardner-Webb ended a nine-game losing streak with a 58-50 win over Charleston Southern on Thursday night. The Runnin' Bulldogs (7-13, 2-6 Big South Conference) trailed 24-23 at halftime, but used a solid performance from their bench to pull away from Charleston Southern in the second half. Gardner-Webb scored 26 points off the bench compared to just four for the Buccaneers (11-9, 5-3) and outrebounded Charleston Southern 41-31. David Brown, who scored 10 points, was the only other player in double figures for the Runnin' Bulldogs, who had seven players score at least six points. Jamarco Warren scored 19 points on 5 3-pointers, and Kelvin Martin added 12 points and nine rebounds for the Buccaneers, who shot 35.7 percent from the field (20 of 56) and saw their three-game winning streak come to an end.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
